All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class AdministrationServlet
extends AbstractDatabaseSpecificOpenMarkServlet

Simplification of the HttpServlet for the purpose of administration. Relys on the parent classes for all handling of the doGet and doPost.

Author:
Trevor Hinson
